 EZRA

EZRA

 

 

Penulis: Ezra, seorang keturunan Harun (7:1-5), seorang imam dan seorang ahli Taurat yang mahir dalam hukum-hukum Musa (7:6, 11-12).

Author: Ezra, a descendant of Aaron (7:1-5), and a priest and a scribe skilled in the law of Moses (7:6, 11-12).

 

 

Waktu Penulisan: Setelah 457 SM.

Time of Writing: After 457 B.C.

 

 

Tempat Penulisan: Yerusalem

Place of Writing: Jerusalem.

 

 

Rentang Waktu yang Tercakup: Kitab ini mencakup satu periode sekitar 82 tahun, dari 539-457 SM, dari tahun pertama pemerintahan Koresh, raja negeri Persia (1:1) sampai hari pertama dari bulan pertama setelah tahun ketujuh Artahsasta, raja negeri Persia (10:17; 7:7).

Time Period Covered: This book covers a period of about eighty-two years, from 539 B.C. to 457 B.C., from the first year of Cyrus the king of Persia (1:1) to the first day of the first month following the seventh year of Artaxerxes the king of Persia (10:17; 7:7).

 

 

Pokok: Kembalinya Orang Israel dari Pembuangan Mereka dan Pembangunan Kembali Rumah Allah sebagai Permulaan Pemulihan Allah di Antara Umat Pilihan-Nya bagi Kesaksian-Nya di Bumi Menurut Ekonomi-Nya

Subject of Ezra: The Return of the Children of Israel from Their Captivity and the Rebuilding of the House of God as the Initiation of God's Recovery among His Elect for His Testimony on the Earth according to His Economy

 

 

 

 

 

 

EZRA 1

EZRA 1

 

 

I. Kembali dari Pembuangan di Bawah Kepemimpinan Zerubabel yang Rajani

I. The return of the captivity under the kingly leadership of Zerubbabel

1:1-6:22

1:1-6:22

A. Pernyataan Koresh, Raja Persia

A. The decree of Cyrus the king of Persia

1:1-4

1:1-4

 

 

1:1 1aPada tahun pertama zaman Koresh, raja negeri Persia, Tuhan 2bmenggerakkan hati 3Koresh, raja Persia itu untuk menggenapkan cfirman yang diucapkan oleh Yeremia, sehingga disiarkan di seluruh kerajaan Koresh secara lisan dan tulisan pengumuman ini:

1:1 1a Now in the first year of Cyrus the king of Persia, so that the b word of Jehovah by the mouth of Jeremiah might be accomplished, Jehovah 2c stirred up the spirit of 3 Cyrus the king of Persia; and he made a proclamation throughout all his kingdom and put it also in writing, saying,

1:2 Beginilah perintah aKoresh, raja Persia: Segala kerajaan di bumi telah dikaruniakan kepadaku oleh Tuhan, bAllah semesta langit. Ia menugaskan aku untuk mendirikan 1rumah bagi-Nya di Yerusalem, yang terletak di Yehuda.

1:2 Thus says a Cyrus the king of Persia, All the kingdoms of the earth has Jehovah the b God of heaven given to me; and He has charged me to build Him a 1 house in Jerusalem, which is in Judah.

1:3 Siapa di antara kamu termasuk umat-Nya, Allahnya menyertainya! Biarlah ia berangkat pulang ke Yerusalem, yang terletak di Yehuda, dan mendirikan rumah Tuhan, Allah Israel, yakni Allah yang diam di Yerusalem.

1:3 Whoever there is among you of all His people, may his God be with him; and let him go up to Jerusalem, which is in Judah, and let him build the house of Jehovah the God of IsraelHe is Godwho is in Jerusalem.

1:4 Dan setiap orang yang tertinggal, di mana pun ia ada sebagai pendatang, harus disokong oleh penduduk setempat dengan perak dan emas, harta benda dan ternak, di samping persembahan sukarela bagi rumah Allah yang ada di Yerusalem.

1:4 And everyone who is left, in whatever place he sojourns, let the men of his place support him with silver and with gold and with goods and with cattle, besides the freewill offering for the house of God, which is in Jerusalem.

 

 

B. Respon dari Kepala-kepala Kaum Keluarga Orang Yehuda dan Benyamin, para Imam, dan Orang-orang Lewi

B. The response of the heads of the fathers' houses of Judah and Benjamin, the priests, and the Levites

1:5-6

1:5-6

1:5 Maka berkemaslah kepala-kepala kaum keluarga orang Yehuda dan orang Benyamin, serta para imam dan orang-orang Lewi, yakni setiap orang yang hatinya adigerakkan Allah untuk berangkat pulang dan mendirikan rumah Tuhan yang ada di Yerusalem.

1:5 Then the heads of the fathers houses of Judah and Benjamin and the priests and the Levites rose up, even everyone whose spirit God had a stirred up to go up to build the house of Jehovah, which is in Jerusalem.

1:6 Dan segala orang di sekeliling mereka membantu mereka dengan barang-barang perak, dengan emas, harta benda dan ternak dan dengan pemberian yang indah-indah, selain dari segala sesuatu yang dipersembahkan dengan sukarela.

1:6 And all those around them strengthened their hands with vessels of silver, with gold, with goods, and with cattle and with precious things, besides all that was offered willingly.

 

 

C. Kerja Sama Raja Koresh

C. The cooperation of King Cyrus

1:7-11

1:7-11

 

 

1:7 Pula raja Koresh menyuruh mengeluarkan 1aperlengkapan rumah Tuhan yang telah diangkut Nebukadnezar dari Yerusalem dan yang ditaruhnya di dalam kuil allahnya.

1:7 Also King Cyrus brought out the 1a vessels of the house of Jehovah, which Nebuchadnezzar had brought out from Jerusalem and had put in the house of his gods;

1:8 Koresh, raja Persia itu, menyuruh mengeluarkan semuanya itu di bawah pengawasan Mitredat, bendahara raja, yang menghitung seluruhnya bagi 1aSesbazar, pembesar di Yehuda.

1:8 And Cyrus the king of Persia had them brought out by the hand of Mithredath the treasurer and had them enumerated to 1a Sheshbazzar the prince of Judah.

1:9 Inilah adaftarnya: tiga puluh bokor emas, seribu bokor perak, dua puluh sembilan pisau,

1:9 And this was a their number: thirty gold dishes, one thousand silver dishes, twenty-nine knives,

1:10 tiga puluh piala emas, pula empat ratus sepuluh piala perak, seribu buah barang-barang lain.

1:10 Thirty gold bowls, four hundred ten silver bowls of a different kind, and one thousand other vessels.

1:11 Barang-barang emas dan perak itu seluruhnya berjumlah lima ribu empat ratus. Semuanya itu dibawa oleh Sesbazar sewaktu orang-orang buangan itu dibawa pulang dari negeri Babel ke Yerusalem.

1:11 There were five thousand four hundred vessels of gold and silver in all. Sheshbazzar brought up all of them with those of the captivity who were brought up from Babylon to Jerusalem.

2:1 a Now these were the children of the province who went up out of the captivity of those who had been carried away, whom Nebuchadnezzar the king of Babylon had b carried away to Babylon, and who returned to Jerusalem and Judah, each man to his city.

2:2 Mereka datang bersama-sama Zerubabel, Yesua, Nehemia, Seraya, Reelaya, Mordekhai, Bilsan, Mispar, Bigwai, Rehum dan Baana. Inilah daftar orang-orang bangsa Israel:

2:56 The children of Jaalah, the children of Darkon, the children of Giddel,
